file_insights.changes: Added responsive sizing and touch target compliance
key_modifications: StyledButton now accepts theme parameter for responsive styling
Added minimum touch target dimensions (44x44px) for accessibility compliance
Implemented responsive padding that adjusts on small screens (sm breakpoint)
Added mobile-specific font size (15px/0.9375rem) for readability
Added touchAction: 'manipulation' to prevent double-tap zoom on mobile
IconButton dimensions updated to enforce 44x44px touch target size with explicit width/height properties
Phase changed from 'Touch Target Compliance Audit' to 'Component Responsive Updates'

patterns_discovered.description: Consistent use of theme.breakpoints.down('sm') for mobile-specific styles following Material-UI conventions
Implementation of WCAG 44x44px minimum touch target standard across interactive components
Styled components leverage Material-UI theme for consistent spacing and breakpoint management
Base styles work universally with mobile-specific optimizations applied via media queries
Touch action property and explicit sizing prevent mobile interaction issues and double-tap zoom

gotchas_discovered.description: IconButton required explicit width and height properties (44px) in addition to min-width/min-height to enforce exact sizing, not just minimums
gotchas_discovered.impact: Without explicit dimensions, the component may not meet 44x44px requirement depending on content

gotchas_discovered.description: StyledButton needed to change from arrow function without parameters to accepting theme parameter to access breakpoints
gotchas_discovered.impact: Required signature change from `(() => ({}))` to `(({ theme }) => ({}))`

gotchas_discovered.description: Default font sizes on mobile may be too small for readability; explicit font-size specification needed in mobile breakpoint
gotchas_discovered.impact: Without this, users on small devices may struggle to read button text

key_achievements: Successfully implemented responsive sizing for Button component
Implemented mobile-specific styling with font size adjustment
Added touchAction property to prevent mobile interaction issues
Updated both standard Button and IconButton components
Maintained backward compatibility with existing props
approach_outcome.phase_progress: Transitioned from Touch Target Compliance Audit to Component Responsive Updates phase

recommendations.recommendation: Add visual regression tests for responsive behavior across device sizes, especially touch target verification
Review other interactive components (links, form inputs, chips) to ensure consistent 44x44px touch target compliance
Document the responsive sizing behavior and touch target compliance requirements in component API documentation
Consider adding aria-label alternatives for icon-only buttons to ensure screen reader accessibility
Monitor CSS-in-JS performance with multiple breakpoint queries; consider extracting common breakpoint queries to constants
Consider adding haptic feedback properties or focus states specific to touch devices for better UX
